attributes.action: Back Date the Stamp Duty Scrappage to Jan 2010
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The budget 2010 announced that Stamp duty will be scrapped for homes below £250,000 for first-time buyers.
I bought my house in February 2010 and had to pay stamp duty after the previous 'holiday' ended. Why not back date it to when the holiday ended?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
